sentences.en: Application of a more extensive Sequoia Germany call card POS machines sample.
sentences.cn: 应用较为广泛的杉德刷卡POS机的调用示例.

sentences.en: Imagine that : Sequoia Capital saying we're sorry!
sentences.cn: 想想看,红杉资本承认自己愚蠢!

sentences.en: Indignant Sequoia Club members across the nation telegraphed, phoned or mailed their resignations.
sentences.cn: 全国各地的愤怒的红杉俱乐部成员纷纷拍电报, 打电话,写信,要求退出俱乐部.

sentences.en: Saunders was the influential chairman of the Sequoia Clubs Fiance Committee.
sentences.cn: 桑德斯是红杉俱乐部财务委员会的举足轻重的主任委员.

sentences.en: Shanghai Sequoia Software is a well funded, fast - growing company based in Zhangjiang Hi - Tech Park, Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 上海思阔雅软件有限公司是在张江高科技园区注册的一家快速成长的高科技企业.

sentences.en: Softbank president Masayoshi Son is recognized by Sequoia company Yahoo.
sentences.cn: 软银总裁孙正义是通过红杉公司认识雅虎的.

sentences.en: The amount I'm suggesting the Sequoia Club contribute is fifty thousand dollars in two installments.
sentences.cn: 我建议红杉俱乐部提供的数目是五万元,分两期付款.

sentences.en: The Sequoia Club attempted to rehabilitate itself.
sentences.cn: 红杉俱乐部试图东山再起.

sentences.en: What is the purpose of the giant sequoia tree?

trans.tran_en: a tree from the western US that can grow to be very tall
